data.title: Top 40 Wedding Venues in Santa Cruz, CA
meta_keywords: wedding venues near santa cruz ca
data.meta_description: Find your perfect wedding venues in Santa Cruz, CA at Zola. We'll help you narrow down your venue search in minutes.
data.text:
Nestled in the Santa Cruz mountains, yet easily accessible, River House is a blend of rustic hideaway and country estate. One of the most beautiful aspects of the property is the wisteria covered arbor that leads the bridal party to the wooden gazebo overlooking San Lorenzo River. 14000 square feet of lawn easily accommodates up to 250 guests. a large aggregate patio serves as the cocktail area. A Redwood grove is available for the ceremony or a small cocktail hour. Flower-lined paths encircle the property. Catering station and bridal cottage included. A 3500 square foot barn has just been completed and is an absolutely stunning addition to the property . The Rustic/Industrial barn is furnished with custom lighting and windmill fans. A 600 Square Foot lounge on the second floors allows for relaxing and viewing of the dance floor. A wrap around cat walk circle the second story. Just added beautiful rustic bathrooms

First established in 1925 as a children's summer camp, this property now acts as a peaceful escape from busy city life. From the cozy accommodations to the down-to-earth event spaces, this venue works to give couples everything they need for a successful wedding weekend. 115 acres of land and stunning views of the surrounding mountains, along with an abundance of oak trees and sprawling grasslands. Indoor ceremonies and receptions can be hosted in various locations on the property. Camp Carmel Valley offers 33 cabins, 4 houses, and bunk rooms onsite to accommodate up to 120 overnight guests. As a pet-friendly venue, you and your partner will be welcome to incorporate your four-legged companion into your events. By offering multiple-day use of the Camp, you can also incorporate "Camp Activities" like yard games, archery, swimming, tennis, and hiking into your celebration and really take advantage of spending time with your friends and family during this special time.

Nestled along the dramatic cliffs and gorgeous white-sand beaches of the Central California Coast, Carmel Fields by Wedgewood Weddings boasts exceptional views across Monterey County. Choose from either the garden ceremony site set alongside Palo Corona Regional Park - an area of outstanding natural beauty - or head down to nearby Monastery Beach for a toes-in-the-sand beach wedding ceremony. Then, settle into your choice of elegant reception rooms, where the modern chandeliers and bistro lights provide a romantic glow guaranteed to make everyone feel the love.

Welcome. Sydalyn Hill is a new, exclusive family-run farm and venue that hosts a limited number of weddings a year between May and September. Perched on a sunny hilltop off Highway 9 across from the Garden of Eden and surrounded by Henry Cowell State Park, this hidden treasure has an expansive view of the San Lorenzo Valley, providing a magical backdrop of rustic elegance for your special day!

With its panoramic views, sweeping lawns, and historic buildings, the Paicines Ranch is the perfect location to begin your happily ever after! The ranch has a peaceful and magical feel that helps our couples feel relaxed and really take in the moments of their special day! With our 27 rooms in the event center, you can spend the whole weekend with family and friends and truly make your wedding a weekend to remember!

This is a special place. The moment you walk through the welcoming rustic gate and past a quintessential redwood barn, you enter a quiet, peaceful world of bird-song, the splash of water falling, tropical plantings of every conceivable varietal, winding paths, and cottages tucked away among exotic palms, banana, and ancient cypress trees. Abundant oak trees and giant prickly-pear cacti stand sentinel. Wooden benches and comfortably-cushioned, bent willow chairs in secluded, shady oases offer places to sit, to rest and to absorb the quiet. This spectacular private estate is a sanctuary, nestled along the Santa Lucia Mountain Range. Family-owned and operated, this expansive Carmel jungle hideaway was created exclusively for destination weddings or for those looking for a relaxing, retreat-style experience. Your closest family and friends gather to spend 2-5 nights together at your own private oasis, a hidden Shangri-la- your home base for days of celebration of love. All are welcome.

The Village is located in the heart of Big Sur along scenic highway 1. Perched along the Big Sur river, 1.25 acres of redwood and sycamore dappled grounds accommodate up to 150 guests. The Village encompasses a full-service restaurant, an organic market and bodega, and a collection of sprawling indoor and outdoor event spaces equipped for celebrations of all kinds. At The Village, guests enjoy locally sourced cuisine, sommelier curated wine lists, and craft cocktails sure to excite the spirit. Event spaces include: multiple lush lawn areas, outdoor bar and lounge areas, a fully-equipped restaurant with private dining and main dining rooms, an interior cocktail lounge and bar, an 1800-square foot barn with roll up doors for an open air experience, and an array of unique add-on offerings for your next event in Big Sur.

Fall in love with timeless beauty of the Monterey Plaza Hotel & Spa. Our historic oceanfront retreat on Cannery Row is a picture-perfect backdrop for weddings and bridal events. Offering sweeping oceanfront views in every direction and warm, personalized service, our classic coastal hotel will captivate your guests with its turn-of-the-century romance and irresistible setting. Let your imagination take flight. From first visit to last dance, allow our professional wedding planners to custom curate your perfect celebration, tapping a trusted team of premier vendors, including photographers, florists, musicians and wedding officiants. We also stand ready to delight your guests with unique-to-Monterey experiences, including wine tasting tours in Carmel Valley, and bike trips along scenic Monterey Bay.

Holman Ranch is a nationally-recognized venue offering a luxury event experience with wide-ranging amenities. See why visitors from around the world have gathered here since 1928 to share their love. A boutique winery with stunning vineyards that produce some of the region’s best pinot noir and chardonnay. Our state-of-the-art wine cave allows for unique tasting experiences and a venue for cocktail hours or seated dinners.

EFFORTLESS & DELICIOUS WEDDINGS Weddings at Sand Rock Farm are magical! Guests love the unique, historic setting and clients love the curated vendor services that allow them to relax and enjoy the planning process leading to a beautiful and effortless wedding day. Your experienced and professional wedding planning and coordination team will ensure a seamless event down to every last delicious detail. Weddings include wedding design, planning and coordination, exclusive use of all Sand Rock Farm venue spaces for six hours of event time, complimentary custom wedding cake, cafe lighting, wine barrel cocktail tables, rustic wood bars, fire pit lounge, restrooms, and venue management. Clients work with preferred vendors for catering, sound/music, floral design and shuttle services. A lodging buyout is optional. Sand Rock Farm is also a great location for romantic elopements, engagement photo shoots, retreats, corporate events and film shoots.

In 2005, proprietors Ken & Julie Warwick and Nigel Lythgoe began the pursuit of turning their long-held dream of owning a vineyard into a reality. Once childhood friends in the backstreets of Liverpool, the Emmy-winning pair would grow up to produce the primetime hit, American Idol. It was during their time on Idol, travelling between audition cities, that they first discovered Paso Robles, a wine region still under the radar. Not long after consulting with their families, Ken and Nigel purchased and began redevelopment of an old-vine property located at the northern edge of the Paso Robles AVA. Over ten years later, Villa San-Juliette has emerged as a premier wine destination on the Central Coast.

The Highlands House is an elegant-meets-homey mansion with a private yard nestled in enchanted forests of the Santa Cruz Mountains. The venue features several rooms for dining and dancing, a wet bar, a large kitchen, two changing rooms, an elegant staircase perfect for grand entrances. A brick pathway leads from the house to the lawn. There, you’ll find a ceremony area on one side and on the other, space large enough for guests to dine and play yard games. The lawn is surrounded by trees and hedges, creating intimacy for your upscale backyard party. Tables and chairs are provided. The rest - from décor to caterers - is up to you, which makes the Highlands House an extraordinarily customizable venue. The Highlands House can host up to 200 people in the peak season (April – October) and 100 during the winter season (November – March). This includes your guests, vendors, and anyone else helping you on your big day.

Discover the Peninsula from Monterey Marriott. Situated along the waterfront overlooking Monterey Bay, our inviting hotel offers a premier blend of location and services designed to make your stay special. Unwind in peaceful rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows offering views of the Bay or downtown. Savor fresh, locally-sourced cuisine at our restaurant, relax by our outdoor pool or visit our 24-hour gym. Take advantage of our partnership with the adjacent Monterey Conference Center, where our combined venues boast over 56,000 square feet of exceptional spaces for all of your corporate events and social galas. No matter which venue you select, our hotel's expert team will be there to ensure every detail is exactly as you imagine.

Nestled in the heart of downtown Monterey, Cella Restaurant & Bar welcomes you to experience a culinary journey that embraces the abundance of the Central Coast. Our family-style meals are a celebration of community and connection, offering a bountiful spread that brings people together. From intimate company gatherings to joyous rehearsal dinners, our heated pergola and inviting dining room provide versatile space for any occasion. Whether you are seeking a charming atmosphere or considering a full buyout, we’re here to craft a unforgettable experience.

TWO VENUES ONE TEAM: THE CENTURY + NINE3ONE We offer two full service wedding venues located in Modesto, Ca. With decades of experience in venue, food, and beverage services combined, we are ready to guide you down your planning journey from day one all the way to “I DO!”. The Century is a chic, urban venue built in the early 1900s with exposed brick walls, beautiful crystal chandeliers and gorgeous acacia wood floors. The Century has room for up to 250 guests for reception only, and up to 175 for a ceremony and a reception. Nine3One is a coworking facility located next door to The Century that opened 2019. Nine3One features 3 unique event spaces. The Alcove is the main event space that leads out into The Botanical Breezeway, a completely covered outdoor space that runs the length of the entire building. The Bouquet Bar is a small event space perfect for smaller parties and also makes a great space for cocktail hour. Nine3One has room for up to 70 guests when using all three spaces.

Let the shimmering waters and fragrant pines create memories of a lifetime. We have accommodations for all types of wedding ceremonies and receptions. You can have a scenic outdoor wedding at our beautiful lakefront Garden Gazebo or have a more traditional setting in one of our many event spaces. Our experienced team will make sure you will have the wedding of your dreams. Please send your email in inquiry to receive package information.

Magnificent Views Enhanced With an Exceptional Facility Creates an Outstanding Wedding Venue. Located on a gorgeous hilltop, Boulder Ridge by Wedgewood Weddings features far-reaching views of Almaden Valley, a cozy ballroom fireplace, and elegant styling to bring your wedding to life. This lavish San Jose venue is sure to impress your guests with its Craftsman-style architecture to its alluring outdoor bar, private entrance, and tranquil setting. The dramatic ceremony site will leave your guests breathless with its scenic backdrop to your everlasting vows.

Redwood Ranch is a rustic wedding venue located at the edge of the South Fork of the Kaweah River in Three Rivers, California. (We're about halfway between Los Angeles and San Francisco.) Our very private and secluded 270-acre ranch at the foothills of Sequoia National Park features numerous outdoor ceremony and reception sites nestled in the woods or overlooking the river (with 1800 feet of private river frontage) and exclusive use of Redwood Ranch to enable you the flexibility to create a truly special event that matches your unique vision. This is a working ranch with cattle, donkeys, peacocks, and chickens. We do have an occasional deer wandering through, as well as foxes, raccoons and many birds and butterflies. We do not offer catering but have a long list of local vendors we’d be happy to provide you with - you are welcome to select all your own vendors.

Couples seeking a stunning oceanfront setting for their big day will fall in love with Mavericks House. With indoor and outdoor celebration space above a beautiful, protected cove, this venue is the perfect spot for a romantic wedding by the sea. Embraced by a grove of trees and overlooking the Pacific, our ceremony garden can accommodate seating for up to 140 guests with views of the ocean, sailboats and marine life. Our spacious ballroom, lined with windows facing the sea, leads to an outdoor deck offering a picturesque backdrop for all your wedding memories. Our experienced event team is dedicated to making sure your big day turns out exactly as you've dreamed.

We are more than just a restaurant. We are family. We like to make your special day the most memorable day at Fogo! We have spaces for intimate spaces for 10 guests, 20 guests, 30, 40, and more. Totally customizable floor space, with a full bar lounge. Our extensive menu offers a full experience of 14 different cuts of Beef, Pork, Chicken, and Lamb; we even offer Pescatarian, Vegetarian, and Vegan options for guests.

Pie Ranch is a 27.5-acre farm that serves youth and our community through educational programming, community events, and partnerships with the Amah Mutsun Land Trust as well as other land-based organizations. We are located on the ancestral homelands of the Quiroste peoples, of whom there are no living descendants, and we partner with the Amah Mutsun Tribal Band. A stunning coastal venue for a farm wedding, Pie Ranch offers an events barn, a large meadow, a fully equipped outdoor kitchen and redwood classroom. We are located just across Hwy 1 from Año Nuevo State Park and beach. Please inquire with us to learn more, or to come out for a site tour!

We are pleased to present to you a spectacular outdoor venue, Tuscan Gardens. We are a privately-owned venue located in the countryside of Kingsburg, California. Our venue is situated among majestic almond trees and charming grape vineyards. Upon entering our grounds you’ll find rose gardens, lush greenery, fountains, and our iconic fire bowl. Our pavilion is located towards the back of the property giving you an intimate setting for your event.

Located in the heart of California’s beautiful Central Coast, our venue offers a classic style barn surrounded by thriving vineyards, setting the stage for an unforgettable wedding day. The rustic elegance of our newly renovated barn, combined with the scenic beauty of the rolling hills and an enchanting ceremony site under oak trees, creates a timeless and romantic atmosphere that is perfect for celebrating your love with family and friends in this captivating California setting.

Congratulations on your upcoming wedding! The AC Hotel San Francisco Waterfront offers a contemporary and stylish atmosphere. Our wedding venues are designed with modern aesthetics in mind, often featuring sleek decor and comfortable settings. Situated in San Francisco, the hotel provides picturesque views of the waterfront which can create a beautiful backdrop for your wedding ceremony and reception. The hotel offers various event spaces to accommodate different wedding sizes and styles. We have options for indoor and outdoor ceremonies and receptions, allowing you to choose based on your preferences and the season. Our hotel provide comprehensive wedding packages that include services such as catering, food and beverages, event planning assistance, decor options, and more. It's essential to inquire about what's included in our packages and any additional services we offer. Please contact the hotel directly and schedule a visit to see the venue in person

Coyote Creek Golf Club is a premier Morgan Hill wedding venue. Nestled in the heart of Morgan Hill, California, the Coyote Creek Golf Club provides a picturesque countryside venue for your big day. With rolling hills and cascading lakes as a natural backdrop, our stunning golf club offers the perfect setting for your romantic ceremony, cocktail hour and reception. Our venue has been impeccably designed to create a romantic and memorable wedding that will be cherished by all for years to come. Exchange your “I Do's in our expertly landscaped wedding ceremony garden with custom arch and expansive views of the golf course. Afterwards celebrate your marital bliss in the contemporary ballroom which features panoramic floor to ceiling windows.

Located in Los Gatos, CA, just a short drive away from the heart of San Jose. Situated in a magical, wooded forest, the 4+ acre property offers couples a breathtaking setting. Our venue features a beautiful, 2,000-square-foot deck where unforgettable ceremonies and receptions can be held. In this open-air setting, couples can celebrate and create lifelong memories. Situated in the scenic Santa Cruz Mountains, the deck allows those celebrating to take in panoramic vista views that stretch to Monterrey Bay and the Pacific Ocean. Compelling backdrops include the venue's robust orchard and tranquil waterfall. Our venue is more than just a picturesque backdrop; it's a canvas where your dreams come to life. Picture the awe in your guests' eyes as they enter our enchanting forest, take in the dramatic views of the expansive Monterey Bay, the scent of fresh flowers perfuming the air, and the gentle whispers of romance that seem to float on the breeze.

A gorgeous hilltop estate with panoramic views of the San Jose skyline and surrounding mountains, this spacious wedding venue is breathtaking inside and out. The outdoor ceremony lawn features stunning views of rolling hills that span toward the Pacific coast. Vast open skies make for splendid sunsets and are enjoyed from the wraparound terrace during the evening. This picturesque country estate allows a convenient escape from the city in an exquisite Mediterranean atmosphere; The Ranch at Silver Creek awaits couples eager to say 'I do' with a fantastic view.

Shouldn't every wedding begin in Harmony? Harmony finds many forms, but rarely a whole town—so what better place than here to find a little harmony of your own? From Harmony's quirky-quaint chapel and one-of-a-kind history, to its charming gardens and surrounding backdrop of gently rolling hills, our Central Coast wedding venue is a natural fit for notable nuptials.

Oak + Ivy at Home Sweet Home is a modern farmhouse Vacation Rental located in Paso Robles, California that boasts a romantic + rustic vibe to your wedding ceremony. This wedding venue features large gorgeous oak trees and some of the most exclusive scenery on the West Coast. Convienently located near downtown Paso Robles and with close proximity to hwy 101. Our team is dedicated to making your private events romantic and fun. We pride ourselves on our attention to detail and personalized service. Many package options to make your stay with us, one to remember! Inquire for more information.

When you're looking for an elegant, upscale and private setting for a wedding, the Mira Vista Estate on a vineyard in Paso Robles is the perfect venue. The 5964 square foot home has five bedrooms and six bathrooms, with two private casitas that can be used as suites or makeup rooms. Large windows fill the house with natural light and provide beautiful sunset views over the vines. Warm hardwood flooring and tiles create a cozy ambiance in the living room with inviting furnishings created from recycled materials including upcycled wooden beams. The fully stocked kitchen is perfect for hosting large parties or intimate dinners inside or out.

Welcome to Shashi Hotel. Create memorable experiences with our modern, minimalist, and purposeful design, thoughtful lifestyle amenities and highly personalized guest service. Located in the heart of Silicon Valley, near the Shoreline Amphitheater, Google HQ, a block away from the Computer History Museum. Shashi Hotel is perfectly situated near some of the most captivating and sought after wedding venues in the Bay Area, only 1.8 miles away from Rengstorff House. We are honored hotel partners for Filoli, Hakone Gardens, and Saratoga Springs.

Welcome to the beautiful venue of Radial Estate, formerly known as Rotta Winery. This property is home to the second oldest winery and the first vineyard planted in Paso Robles. We offer wonderful outdoor spaces for weddings and events. Imagine yourself getting married under the willow tree or in front of our historic building. Come and see for yourself!

A haven in Central California, this classic and picturesque wedding venue boasts a beautifully manicured garden area, a stunning shaded terrace ceremony space, and an abundance of photo opportunities so you can show off the California weather! Enjoy a serene ceremony among lush greens, a wrought-iron backdrop, and stone fixtures that give this space a laidback vibe. After exchanging your vows, celebrate in the adjacent grand ballroom, and relax with your friends and family at this modern sanctuary.

Tucked away in beautiful Paso Robles wine country lies Almond Springs, a 5th generation family owned and operated ranch. With decades of history, fun and unique buildings, and incredible landscaping and views throughout, our venue is ideal for the couple looking for a blend of modern amenities with a rustic charm. We thrive on our flexibility with the utmost goal of providing you with a wedding you will never forget. Grab a drink in Legends Saloon, shoot pool in the Mineshaft Gameroom, and fall in love once again overlooking thousands acres of rolling hills. Interested? We would love to have you out!

Thomas Fogarty Winery is an intimate, elegant, and relaxing setting for memorable events! Surrounded by our working vineyards & handsome redwoods, our event spaces flow down the mountainside on three separate levels, each offering stunning views. Our spacious Hill House & Pavilion accommodates indoor and outdoor weddings, corporate, and other private events. The 4,000 sq. ft. covered Pavilion overlooks our Damiana Chardonnay vineyard and can host the ultimate outdoor reception. It also serves as an elegant alternate ceremony space for our special wedding couples. Our Pavilion's unique copper roof and open air feel make the structure truly a Bay Area "one of a kind.” The Hill House and its adjoining Terrace is perfect for an indoor dining reception, lined with glass windows on runners allowing it to be closed off on cooler days without sacrificing our famous view. Contact us for a site visit! We would love to meet you!

Opolo Vineyards is located in Paso Robles wine country. Flourishing amount oak tree-line roads, acres of vines and walnut groves, Opolo Vineyrds is the ideal location for weddings. Share vows with loved ones atop a picturesque hilltop followed by cocktail hour celebrations. Ride a rustic shuttle to a romantically lit, barrel lined reception room or continue your celebration on our hilltop. Dance the night away under warm lighting and toast to a lifetime together. Opolo Vineyards is not only home to quintessential views, award winning wines and top-notch hospitality, we are also please to provide our premier wedding experience.

Located in the heart of the Bay Area, Domenico Winery offers the beauty and ambiance of a working winery without the drive to Napa or Sonoma. With four unique rental rooms, our venue is available to host events of any kind and is the key to turning your dream event into a reality. We have proudly hosted thousands of jaw-dropping events since 2004 and we are proud to be the premier special events venue on the San Francisco/Bay Area Peninsula.

The Grand 1401 offers two beautiful ballrooms. The Grand Ballroom is located on the 1st floor and has a capacity of up to 500 guests and comes with a Mezzanine that oversees the ballroom. The Grand on 10th is located on the 10th floor and has a capacity of up to 300 guests and has access to the veranda that overlooks downtown Fresno. The Grand 1401 is on the official list of the Nation's historic places worthy of preservation. The former SJL&P Building is a highly significant building in Fresno, both as a visual architectural landmark for the City and as an excellent example of the Italian Renaissance Revival style.

Whether you are hosting a wedding reception, ceremony, bridal shower or bachelor(ette) party our dynamic ballrooms and private event spaces provide an upscale yet relaxed space for your special day. We host truly unique events and deliver sophisticated fun through combining our from-scratch Italian-America menu with the classic games of bowling and bocce ball. Let our talented event team work with you on a customized event to suit your personal style and help you bring your dream wedding to life to create a perfect day that you and all your guests will be sure to remember!

Welcome to the historic Rengstorff House, Mountain View’s oldest home and one of the finest examples of Victorian Italianate architecture on the West Coast! We are located at 3070 N. Shoreline Boulevard. Fully restored in 1991, the Rengstorff House features: a Victorian Italianate design with a hip roof; a central gable crowned by a widow's walk; a front portico; and a symmetrical room layout. The gracious dining room and four lovely parlors downstairs, all decorated with classic period décor, open up to brick patios surrounded by manicured lawns, blooming flowers and natural areas. Nearby you will find the Shoreline Lake, Golf Links, and two, classic eateries to enjoy and explore.

With both outdoor and indoor venue spaces, we are sure to accommodate your needs! We have a rustic setting with a backdrop of the hillside, vineyards, and majestic redwoods. We provide an outstanding Italian cuisine menu for you and your guests to enjoy, as well as many award-winning wines. Dine and dance into the night under our romantic bistro lighting while our full waitstaff ensures you have the perfect evening. We also include an in-house day of coordinator to help you in the planning process. We are the perfect location for your event!

Villa Ragusa had its grand opening in 2002. Since then we've helped create memories to last a lifetime. Recent renovations have been made to add a modern touch to our classic European style. This helps to offer the perfect setting for any type of special event. Starting with our events managers, catering department & serving staff you and your guests will leave remembering their special occasion at Villa Ragusa for years to come. When it comes to a small intimate gathering or a grand 650 person celebration, our highly qualified events team are always available to ensure your event needs are exceeded throughout the planning of your wedding.

Start your forever at Cambria Pines Lodge and discover uniquely enchanting indoor and outdoor wedding venues steeped in the beauty and tranquility of the California Central Coast. A world-class location for groups of 50 to 250 guests, our Gazebo Garden provides tables scattered about the lawn with market umbrellas that provide shade from the midday sun. A lovely stepping-stone aisle makes a pathway through the grass while stunning flowers abound in the surrounding beds. We also provide a more intimate outdoor wedding location in the traditional Victorian White Garden with white-flowering shrubs and plants. Our gorgeous Peacock Room, Treetop Room and Sycamore Room also provide ideal spaces for indoor receptions. In addition, our seasoned catering staff is happy to create custom menus for your big day.

* Exclusive & privately owned venue* La Casa dei Sogni, Italian for "The House of Dreams", is located 20 miles South of San Francisco, off Pacific Coast Highway 1. This spacious, unique, Mediterranean inspired mansion offers breathtaking ocean views through 30 ft floor-to-ceiling windows...a stunning backdrop to any event! We accommodate up to 150 seated guests inside & have a magnificent terrace for cocktails & sunset gazing. The house is nestled atop 20 acres of private land, perfect for a nature walk or to photos. We offer 2 large bedrooms, one for each party to get dressed & ready for the big day. Both have a large full bath, big screen TV, WiFi, refrigerator, glassware, lots of mirrors, & gorgeous views. We also have 2 large bathrooms on main floor and on-site parking.

Tar Creek Ranch is located in San Luis Obispo County, in the heart of the bucolic Huasna Valley, yet only minutes from the quaint village of Arroyo Grande and Pismo Beach. We are situated on 95 acres with some incredible different features. The ranch features a three-bedroom vacation rental that is situated in a serene location on the property. Also located on the property is a barn with an inspiring bar/ patio area, a performance stage, as well as a large grass area.

Historic Seven Sycamores Ranch was the original namesake of the McKellar’s citrus farm back in 1927. On this ranch, Hugh and Vernice McKellar built a home and raised their family. Under the new name of McKellar Ranch, their son, and our current owner, Farmer Bob McKellar, still farms the same citrus orchards that his father Hugh planted years and years ago. Spanning generations, the farm has been many things to many people. This place has been home to countless memories that have helped mold and shape lives. Historic Seven Sycamores isn't just a venue; it is a home with history at its heart, where life has lived. Where others can plant a seed and lay the foundation for their future – where together, they can make that promise grow.

The Westin Hotel San Francisco Airport is an intimate and beautiful venue for your reception. The stunning string of pearls chandelier's will amaze you. You will have a private wing of the hotel for you and your guests only. The quality of food and service is the very best on the Peninsula. The Westin will create your dream wedding reception!

Nestled just five miles outside downtown Templeton, our venue offers the tranquility of the countryside with the convenience of nearby amenities. Surrounded by rolling pastures where cows graze, it feels like a secluded retreat despite its proximity to towns like Paso Robles. Located in the heart of wine country, with hundreds of vineyards close by, it’s the perfect destination for wine lovers. The Central Coast is a global hotspot, drawing visitors from all corners of the world. Renowned for its stunning beaches, award-winning wineries and picturesque landscapes, it's a destination that captivates with its beauty and charm. The Central Coast promises an unforgettable journey for couples seeking a taste of paradise.

Whether you are looking for a complete wedding and reception experience or a special place for an intimate wedding or commitment ceremony, The Mountain Terrace is a stunning outdoor and indoor venue that will engage you and your guests in a beautiful outdoor journey. Experience your ceremony in our grassy meadow with bay views peeking through a redwood grove. Dining outdoors on the expansive redwood deck allows your reception guests to take in the breathtaking views at The Mountain Terrace. As an alternative, the rustic beauty of our country-style lodge provides an alternative backdrop for a cozy and intimate reception. We celebrate a variety of different cultural and lifestyle ceremonies and welcome your individual rituals and traditions. The Mountain Terrace is a place for you to celebrate your special day in the style you feel most accustomed.

A premier wedding venue on California’s central coast, Riata Ranch provides a luxurious and private setting that is a short 20 minute drive from the heart of San Luis Obispo’s thriving downtown. We offer multiple romantic and rustic chic event spaces to choose from throughout our picturesque property. A variety of event packages are designed to cover all of your potential needs. Rustic weddings under one of our many large oak trees can provide you with a traditional backdrop. Our one-of-a-kind Grand Tipis, imported from Sweden, will give an atmosphere unrivaled on the central coast of California. The timeless and iconic Ranch House sits with a vantage point that allows you and all of your guests to take in the expansive beauty of Riata Ranch. Each package offers versatility to ensure that all of your wedding dreams come true. To fully appreciate the beauty of our property, please come visit us in person. Just call or email us to arrange a private tour.

Nestled in the picturesque Milpitas Hills, CA, Big Dog Vineyards offers panoramic views of the San Francisco Bay Area, making it an ideal estate winery and vineyard. Our spacious and modern country-style venue, including the Front Lawn + Porch, Back Patio, and Barrel Room, provides the perfect setting for a charming ceremony and reception. Conveniently located just 3 miles from bustling Silicon Valley, our property offers easy access to nearby hotels, caterers, and sightseeing opportunities. Yet, nestled in its serene surroundings, guests will feel transported to their private wine country retreat. Our Winemaker's dedication to the craft of viticulture and enology shines through in our award-winning, handmade wines. Crafted in small batches with high-quality ingredients, Big Dog offers a variety of options to elevate your special day.

Fairview Crystal Springs eases the worry of planning, with four specially designed wedding packages. Our all-inclusive wedding packages are designed based on our most popular selection of services, however out wedding experts are ready to sit down and custom design your event based on your vision for your dream day! All of our wedding packages are 100% customizable, so schedule an appointment today to tour our venue and sit down for a free consultation. Whether you dream of a grand gala or an intimate gathering, our team is here to ensure that every detail of your special day is tended to with the utmost care and attention of detail. We can accommodate groups as small as 50 and up to 250 guests, so not matter the size, we are ready to be a part of your wedding day.

The story of Higuera Ranch begins in 1769 when Franciscan missionaries planted figs along the Pacific Coast Trail. These beautiful trees became a symbol of faith, hope, and strength. Almost 250 years later, our goal is to keep those traditions alive! Your guests will find rest under the strong branches of the Higuera Tree, and couples will share everlasting memories in the Olive Grove. Higuera Ranch is the perfect setting to begin your love story...

Originally a part of the Ran­cho Cor­ral de Piedra and one of the oldest existing milking barns in the county. Rancho Corral de piedra was a 30,911-acre (125.09 km2) Mex­i­can land grant in present day San Luis Obispo County, Cal­i­for­nia con­sist­ing of two square leagues given in 1841 by Gov­er­nor Juan B. Alvarado to José María Villav­i­cen­cio, with an exten­sion of five square leagues given in 1846, by Gov­er­nor Pio Pico. The grant was located between present day San Luis Obispo and Arroyo Grande, and bounded on the south by Arroyo Grande Creek

Welcome. Blanco, an Urban Venue, is the Bay Area’s premier event space in historic downtown San Jose. This charming building has been transformed into a three-story and 8,000-square-foot blank canvas ideal for weddings, corporate & social events. Blanco has kept the allure of this historic building by refurbishing some of its original features, like its 150-year-old brick walls. Located in the heart of Silicon Valley, Blanco is a stylish space with an old-world appeal.

Swallow Creek Ranch, a 600 acre cattle ranch is located in the quaint beach town of Cayucos and is the only wedding venue on the central coast of California that offers ocean view ceremony sites and a historic reception barn. At Swallow Creek Ranch we provide the blank canvas for the day of your dreams and allow you to shape your celebration as you see fit. You’ll have access to our venue for the entire weekend which makes for a relaxed affair. You will also have your choice of two ceremony sites; the Hilltop Amphitheatre and the Seaview Meadow, each with their own unique atmosphere. The party continues with cocktail hour in the barnyard beneath our bistro lights followed by a reception for up to 250 guests in our historic blue barn. Elegant or organic, rustic or modern… the scene is set, the ranch is your backdrop. Make your vision come true!

One of San Luis Obispo's newest luxury Weekend Wedding Venues. Begin your legacy at La Lomita Ranch. Step back in time at the exclusive entrance to California’s Edna Valley coastal wine region. Grand Oaks and green peaks circle the lush 160-acre estate, while light and shadow dance against the arched exterior of the luxurious private suites. Once home to famed Arabian horses, the storied Spanish property now welcomes guests from around the globe. La Lomita Ranch is the ideal wedding destination surrounded by rare beauty and a variety of versatile spaces. With a capacity up to 400, our vibrant spaces create a picturesque palette for your ceremony, reception, and more. From The Terrace, Oak Courtyard or The Plaza, to a reception in the covered Pavilion. A wedding retreat unlike any other, our eight luxury suites will inspire you with Spanish charm and soothing refuge, accommodating up to 24 guests.

Couples instantly fall in love with its vintage charm, but Pageo Lavender Farm offers much more to make your day even more special. From the first meeting to the final send-off, the professional staff is committed to create your event of a lifetime. Pageo has an outstanding reputation for service and strives to make each event perfect with full-service coordination so you can focus on enjoying your day.

Welcome. Now booking events at CuriOdyssey! CuriOdyssey is the ideal location for your event, wedding, meeting, birthday party, and more Enjoy our outdoor zoo & exhibits until sundown. All events held at CuriOdyssey must abide by San Mateo County Health orders, including the use of face coverings and social distancing. Whether you’re looking for an intimate gathering in the Zoo, or a lavish affair with 200 of your closest friends, CuriOdyssey is the ideal venue choice.

The Santa Clara Marriot is located in the heart of Silicon Valley and in close proximity to the Santa Clara Convention Center, as well as local businesses like Cisco, HP EMC and Intel. The contemporary facilities of the Santa Clara Marriot make a great setting for your meeting, event or wedding. Treat your guests to top notch accommodations, relaxing surroundings and extraordinary service at this northern California hotel. The Santa Clara Marriot features 24 meeting rooms for a total of 23,500 square feet of meeting space. Accommodate up to 1,200 guests in the California Ballroom, 400 guests in the Hall of Cities Ballroom and 500 in the Grand Ballroom.

Celebrate your special moments in our spacious banquet halls designed to accommodate any size of gatherings. Our state-of-the-art electronics and lights will give you an experience to never forget! Of course, no event is complete without our delicious food, unlike anything you’ve ever eaten. So come and join us at Shubham Halls today to celebrate like you deserve!

Whether you’re looking for San Luis Obispo wedding venues, or hotels in SLO to host one of your Central Coast events, we have space and the expertise to create an exceptional gathering. We can welcome events in San Luis Obispo for up to 75 guests. On the second floor, the Olive Tree Room is a light, airy venue with glass doors and natural light. It opens onto its own garden, making it one of the most distinctive intimate wedding venues Central Coast California offers. And when your special occasion demands a distinctive location, consider our rooftop pool deck with stunning views of the city and mountains as your backdrop. From corporate events to family celebrations and intimate weddings, our venues provide an environment that makes memories.

This beautiful and serene private estate is a historic ranch located in the hills above the town of Woodside just 20 minutes from Interstate 280. You can select a ceremony site that fits your vision – find your special spot in one of the rolling fields, beneath oak or redwood trees, overlooking one of the ponds, or high on the hill top with breathtaking vistas from every angle. The 150-acre property features a large newly renovated 100 year old barn that is ideal for your wedding reception.

Let Desi host your next celebration! We welcome you to our space to enjoy our restaurant and have a memorable experience with your guests. Our private dining room, (The entrance, bar area, or the patio), is available seven days a week for parties of up 40-50 guests in each area or a total of 120 guests for the entire space. Parties are required to participate in a choice of customizable tasting menus that touch various delectable offerings from our desi restaurant menu and Gabru bar menu or custom requests. A perfect upscale casual party for a corporate event or your celebration. Inquire further for specifics of the menu packages we currently offer. Our team will work with you to craft a personalized menu, timeline & more to make your event memorable at our place or your favorite destination.

The Chaminade Resort and Spa is a woodland wedding venue located in Santa Cruz, CA. The newly renovated resort offers an atmosphere of luxury, charm, and tranquility for your special day. There is no better place to say "I do" than surrounded by a dramatic redwood and eucalyptus forest, lush green lawns, and stunning views of the sparkling Monterey Bay. This venue is brimming with West Coast Charm, bringing a refreshed, modern perspective embracing the property's Spanish heritage and enhancing its sprawling 300-acre footprint. With a selection of culinary and accommodation options to boot, this rustic retreat sets the scene for a fairytale wedding. Defined by its Spanish-influenced design and old-time ornaments, this resort is guaranteed to dazzle. Devoted to realizing your marital vision, their staff is eager to share their sublime surroundings with you in a celebration of your love story.

The Seymour Center is an oceanfront hideaway for an intimate wedding that your guests will be talking about for years to come. One of the most unique wedding venues on the Central Coast, The Seymour Center boasts breathtaking ocean views and multiple bluff-top terraces. After the ceremony, come inside and sip cocktails while your guests gaze upon the marine life of the Monterey Bay. Unveil a one of a kind wedding at the Seymour Marine Discovery Center. Call or email us directly to learn more.

Spread over 25 acres of gardens, The Brothers Ranch features palms, tropical flowers, and bamboo that helps transport couples and their guests to another place. This lush landscape serves to enhance a couple’s wedding theme and is complete with a refurbished courtyard and barn. The Brothers Ranch has multiple ceremony and reception areas to choose from, both inside and out. In addition, there is a bar, full kitchen, and designated dressing rooms, along with the sensory-indulging gardens. Up to 500 people can gather at this venue. Soon-to-be-weds can choose their own caterer to be approved by the ranch, allowing the pair to customize their day to their tastes and preferences. Parking is available, with overflow as well. There is only one event planned per day, and the couple has the day before and after the event for setting and cleaning up. The staff is eager to help couples achieve the wedding day they have always wanted!

The romantic atmosphere at The Club of Pasadera fosters the ideal environment for one of the truly special moments in one’s lifetime. The ornate charm and elegant, old-world Spanish décor are paramount to The Club’s distinctive hacienda setting, whether it’s for an intimate wedding ceremony or more elaborate celebration. We provide the flexibility and ambiance for a captivating, memorable event, with each accouterments tailored to compliment the theme and spirit of the occasion. The dining room opens out to a surrounding covered patio, all overlooking the golf course and the rolling northern slopes of the Santa Lucia Mountains. Adjoining rooms and courtyards provide ample space to accommodate various social activities, with indoor and outdoor fireplaces adding to the stylish, comfortable setting. Providing the ultimate in personalized service, the Club staff will plan and execute every detail for the occasion.

Bring your “happily ever after” to life with Tarpy’s Roadhouse handling all the details that make your wedding truly unforgettable. Tarpy’s can create the affair of a lifetime featuring creative cuisine, fine wines, expert service and stunning backdrops. With a long and storied history dating back to 1917, the Roadhouse property creates an idyllic setting for your ceremony and/or rehearsal dinner. Wisps of trailing ivy line the rugged stone walls with gorgeous greenery and flowers adorning every nook. There’s a rich array of private and semi-private rooms, landscaped gardens, courtyards and patios, — a heavenly backdrop for your special celebration. Get married here or have a beach wedding and meet friends and family at Tarpy’s for the reception of your dreams.

Quail Hollow Ranch is a charming ranch of historical and ecological significance. The ranch was once the home of the Lane family who owned Sunset Magazine from 1929-1991. The park sits on ecologically rare habitats with endemic wild flowers and abundant wildlife. Your reservation includes the exquisite ranch house and spacious lawn which offers scenic views of an orchard and the forested Santa Cruz Mountains. This location is well-suited for outdoor ceremonies and receptions.

Welcome. Carmel Valley is an American Viticultural Area (AVA) located 12 miles inland from the California coastline and within Monterey County. Due to its elevation among the steep hills of the Santa Lucia Range, Carmel Valley is sheltered from Monterey’s cool maritime fog, allowing for the production of rich, flavorful Bordeaux-style wines. Carmel Valley and the surrounding region are also home to several world-class golf courses, a plethora of five-star restaurants and resorts, and countless outdoor activities making it the ideal vacation destination for any wine enthusiast!

We are honored by your interest in Shadowbrook’s facilities and services for something as special as your wedding and reception. For 75-years Shadowbrook has been a favorite setting for exquisite weddings because of its romantic ambiance and magnificent setting on the banks of the Soquel Creek, near the delightful village of Capitola-by-the-Sea. We are proud to have been recognized for being the “Most Romantic Restaurant” in Northern California by the readers of San Francisco Focus and voted as one of the Top 100 Romantic Restaurants in the nation by 5 million members of Open Table. As you learn more about us and what we can provide, I think you will agree that Shadowbrook is the perfect venue to make your wedding day even more memorable. Much more than just a beautiful setting amongst lush grounds and waterfalls, Shadowbrook’s interior has an old-world charm that will put you and your guests at ease.

Charming, rustic, sweet, romantic – these are words used to describe Big Sur Bakery. The whimsy runs deep in the history of the space; perched upon a succulent covered slice of heaven in the heart of Sur Country. It all started with Alice Jaeger - the legend at the heart of the our story. In 1929, while the Pacific Coast Highway was under initial construction, Alice began plans for a homestead haven to offer travelers a place to rest & refuel. Alice planted cacti & succulents by hand throughout the land. With her husband, Steve, a ranch-style home was built in 1936. It later became a diner + tiny inn; a gathering place for locals and wanderers to rest, refuel, and nourish with a homegrown meal. That ranch-home is what we call Big Sur Bakery today. We're honored to carry on the traditions. The unique charm of Big Sur Bakery is built into the walls & windows through the tales of every single love story that has graced our sweet little rest-stop-meets-bakeshop we call home.

Ridgemark Golf Course & Resort can arrange your wedding and reception with the attention to detail and flexibility to make your experience that memorable, unique occasion you will treasure forever. We will provide superior service, experienced, on-site professionals and one convenient contact point – all while delivering a special brand of customer care complimented by our ready to please staff. Each wedding and reception is customized to your special requirements. You set the ambiance, with your choice of room with golf course views from the spacious windows or outdoor settings with breath taking view of the Hollister countryside. Here at Ridgemark, we want your menu to be as unique as you. Our Executive Chef will create a custom menu to match your personality for a meal your guests will rave over. Make Ridgemark your one-stop-shop for all of your wedding needs to make the wedding of your dreams a reality.

Tucked away in the former Aptos Village, this lush, 10-acre park offers a breathtaking outdoor venue. The charming clubhouse and picturesque park is located between the beaches and hills of Aptos, just steps off the highway and minutes from downtown Santa Cruz. The spacious, grassy lawn is a charming location for an outdoor ceremony, and your guests will enjoy the sounds of the babbling brook that lines the park. Tall, green trees frame the lawn and surrounding area, and happy birds tweet a song just for you on your special day under a cloudless blue sky. A sweet gazebo makes your fantasy ceremony come alive, and your guests will enjoy the festivities inside the grand hall. The lovely stone patio will be filled with the people you love enjoying themselves as they celebrate your love while dining and dancing.

Stroll through this 6 acre neighborhood park or rest on one of the handsome benches created by artist Mary Fuller, which are carved with images of local wildlife, as you catch the breathtaking view of the Monterey Bay. A picnic area and a wheelchair accessible playground and restrooms are available. Wedding ceremonies are available with a reservation on the bluff overlooking the ocean.

With a maximum capacity of 180 people, Hakone Estate and Gardens offers both indoor and uncovered outdoor settings. The overall feel of the 18 acres private venue is classy and outdoorsy. Wheelchair accessible venue offers nearby parking for its guests. Event planning services are also available by Hakone Estate and Gardens to help couples plan a day that they can remember for the rest of their lives. Although the venue does not provide catering or event rentals, We do have a list of trusted preferred vendors who have years of professional experience. The long list of preferred vendors & caterers that Hakone Estate and Gardens provides range from caterers and florists to entertainment and officiants. Each of our preferred vendors have worked with Hakone Estate and Gardens before and is familiar with the venue’s policies and regulations.

When guests arrive at the redwood-and-glass building, they often gather in its open, airy lobby. Then, if you’re having your ceremony here (and most couples do), your family and friends will be ushered through Craftsman-styled double wooden doors to the serene South Patio. This beautiful, crescent-shaped flagstone space wraps around one entire side of the building and features a Zen-like border of Japanese maples, native plants and graceful oaks. Handcrafted ceramic urns are integrated throughout and serve as artful and calming water features. You can opt to exchange vows in front of those wooden entry doors, or take full advantage of the patio’s pièce de résistance and say “I do” beneath an asymmetrical canvas canopy. There’s ample room for al fresco cocktails on the patio before everyone moves into the Sequoia Room for dinner. This reception area feels quite spacious, with its cathedral ceiling, polished hardwood floors, and two walls of glass
